title: Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for the collection, handling, and analysis of digital evidence

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Mississippi Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting access to the following records related to the collection and analysis of digital forensics:

1. Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for the collection, handling, and analysis of digital evidence.
2. Training and certification records for Michael Hansbro Badge # 22433 regarding digital forensics.
3. Quality assurance and control procedures for digital forensic processes.
4. Case logs and chain of custody records for all cases involving Michael Hansbro badge # 22433
5. Internal and external audit reports evaluating digital forensics processess. 
6. Incident reports related to breaches or issues in the digital forensics process.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jay Hunt

communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: Race / Ethnicity / School Type
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

sufficient to show the race and ethnicity by the gender of the student for high schools, for the school years 2017-2018; 2019-2020; 2021-2022.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Forest Gregg
